product-description: M/DN Intramedullary Fixation Humeral Nail. Catalog no. 00-2254-195-09. Recall # Z-1004-04.
recalling-firm: Zimmer Inc. Warsaw, IN, by letters dated March 16, 2004. Firm initiated recall is ongoing.
reason-for-recall: One and possibly more units in the lot have the proximal angled hole oriented 180 degrees reversed from the required orientation.
